item.title: Youtube Editor Quick Job (AGE RESTRICTION ISSUE) - Upwork
item.description:
I have a youtube video 15mins long on the Bengali Genocide which has been age restricted.

Your job would be to go through the video, and make it a video that wont be age restricted whilst making the minimum number of changes.

I think there are a few shots which are creating the issue.


I want a quick turnaround and will also hire quickly.


Thanks

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, YouTube, YouTube Automation

item.title: Video Editor/ Animator - Upwork
item.description:
We are an education company in the areas of psychometrics and soft skills. To help people understand more about themselves, we use 16 traits found in their personality.

We would like to convert 16 blog articles on each trait into a video. The digital avatar/ voice over has been done. We are looking for a high quality, long term video editor, producer who is able to:

1) Animate in simple yet effective story telling method like this: https://www.youtube.com/@astranovaschool
2) (Optional) Insert the digital avatar and mask them into circle. Add digital spectrum to show the Avatar is talking.
3) Add subtitles (Arial with grey border 11.3 wrap around and 75% transparency)
4) Add logo through out, on top right hand side
5) Add end fame logo and url (www.IDENTI3profiling.com)
6) Render and send the complete files (about 50 - 100 MB) over

The digital avatars, logos and other assets are here:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1cH8_BJT7tzGF2EO8NrAB4agCojDilaLs?usp=drive_link

The amount is for 16 videos.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 28, 2024 08:03 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Nonfiction, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Education, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: MP4, Nonfiction, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Education, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Promotional Video Expert for VeedoAI - June/July 2024 - Upwork
item.description:
We seek a talented and experienced Promotional Video Expert for VeedoAI - https://veedo.ai.

You will be responsible for creating high-quality promotional video content and images for our cutting-edge AI-powered app. Your content will convey key product features and use cases, showcase the progress, and tell our stories compellingly.

Key Responsibilities:

Scripting and Storyboarding: Work closely with the product team to orchestrate the workflows that capture the unique features and capabilities of VeedoAI.

Video Production: Make quality promotional videos that communicate the product's value proposition.

Post-Production Editing: Fine-tune video content to align with the overall brand aesthetic and messaging.

Photography: Capture high-quality images for digital marketing and social media purposes.

Social Media Content Curation: Curate engaging short-form videos and images for social media platforms to enhance product visibility.

In short, we want to talk to you if you can make the following video content, showcasing product features, capabilities, and offerings:
1. https://x.com/pika_labs/status/1729510078959497562?s=20 - showcasing the overall product offering using a story.
2. https://x.com/LightningAI/status/1734998367061582038?s=20 - showcasing each feature
3. https://x.com/togethercompute/status/1734282721982324936?s=20 - showcasing a specific capability.
4. https://x.com/perplexity_ai/status/1798897613070290945 - Telling a product story and purpose
5. https://x.com/perplexity_ai/status/1796203494401040846 - New feature release


Budget: $600
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:55 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Social Media Video, Promotional Video, AVI, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Videography, Music Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Social Media Video, Promotional Video, AVI, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Videography, Music Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Virtual Assistant - Social Media and Content Management - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! I'm looking for a virtual assistant to manage content for my e-commerce brand. The role will have typical startup type tasks like social media posting, editing video for Instagram, TikTok and YouTube Shorts, doing research for blog posts/content, writing website content, basic graphic design and more. The position is part time, and will start with 5-10 hours per week.

Requirements for position:

- Must be fluent in English (can read and write)
- Must be able to create a content calendar that incorporates all content for the month/quarter.
- Must be able to edit TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube shorts video (using tools like Capcut is okay)
- Must be able to gather research for blogs/articles and videos
- Must be able to write descriptions, captions and more
- Must be able to upload videos to YouTube.
- Must be able to upload content to social media
- Must have basic graphic design skills (use of Canva is okay)
- Must be good with attention-to-detail
- Must adhere to deadlines
- Must be familiar with trends in digital marketing and social media

Please submit a short cover letter, as well as a resume.

Thanks,



Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:49 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Digital Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Virtual Assistance, Marketing, Video Editing, Content Editing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management
Skills: Digital Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Virtual Assistance, Marketing, Video Editing, Content Editing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing various types of videos, including promotional videos, interviews, tutorials, and social media content. You will be responsible for editing raw footage into high-quality videos that align with our brand style and message. Attention to detail and a strong sense of storytelling are essential. Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro is required. Additionally, knowledge of motion graphics and color grading is a plus. If you have a creative eye, excellent time management skills, and can work efficiently under tight deadlines, we would love to hear from you.

item.title: Video Editor for a Youtube Channel needed - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there, we are in need of a skilled, experienced, and creative editor who is able to bring our ideas to life in visual form.

The niche we would base our channel in is around education & interesting information.

Exact editing style we would need can be seen on the following channel/s:

James Toland

The style of editing is almost the same, however, the only difference in the storyline is that, we have a human main character that will wear a costume and act as an animal, instead of the animal as the main character.

You would basically get images from our drawing designer who would draw about 99% of the illustrations/images that you would be using in the video and the rest can be your additions if applicable.

*After you get hired, you will receive 99% illustrations drawn by a designer before you start editing*

( Everything would be provided and well organized for you, so you can purely focus on video quality )

Things that you need to pay attention to are as follows:

You have to make sure that the video is fast-paced and that things on the screen are changing quickly and also moving
You have to make sure that every single edit is smoothly done
Music & SFX have to be on point throughout the entire video
You don't need to add subtitles for the entire video, only the important texts (keywords)

Initial compensation that we are offering for this project is 10$ per minute of final video ( as soon as the channel picks up and starts being stable, we will bump it to 11-12$, and as time goes more.. )

You would also receive bonuses from time to time based on your channel's performance.

We would need about 8-10 videos edited monthly ( likely more as the channel picks up ) and each video would be 10-13 min long usually

We look forward to working with you!

Budget: $2,000
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, 3D Animation
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, 3D Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor Wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a passionate and experienced video editor with a keen eye for detail? Do you want to collaborate on growing a YouTube channel and constantly strive for improvement? Then we are looking for you!

What We Are Looking For:

Experience: You have proven experience in editing YouTube videos.

Availability: You can deliver a minimum of 7 videos per week, each 15+ minutes long.

Quality: You are always seeking ways to improve your work and analyze video performance to see what works well and what can be improved.

Send us your portfolio and provide your rate per 15+ minute video. We would also like to know if you are willing to create a short sample video to see if we are a good match.

Apply Now!
If you meet the above requirements and are excited to be part of our team, please respond to this job post. We look forward to seeing your response and portfolio!

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: AI Video Creator for Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an AI Video Creator to join our Social Media team. As an AI Video Creator, you will be responsible for creating engaging and creative videos using artificial intelligence technology for our social media platforms. This role requires a strong understanding of AI video creation tools and techniques, as well as a keen eye for visual storytelling.

  Responsibilities:
  - Utilize AI video creation tools to develop high-quality videos
  - Collaborate with the marketing team to understand video objectives and requirements
  - Edit and enhance videos to ensure they are visually appealing and engaging
  - Stay updated with the latest AI video creation trends and techniques

  Skills:
  - Proficiency in AI video creation software and tools
  - Strong knowledge of video editing and post-production techniques
  - Excellent storytelling and visual communication skills
  - Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment

  We are looking for a freelancer who can work on a medium-sized project for a duration of 1 to 3 months. The ideal candidate should have an intermediate level of expertise in AI video creation and a proven track record of creating engaging videos for social media platforms.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:32 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Developer Tool Demo Video - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a skilled and creative Video Editor/Creator to produce a compelling demo video for our developer tool. This video will be used on our website, social media, and in sales presentations to showcase the product's capabilities

Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with our team to understand the product and its key features.
- Record screen captures of the product in action.
- Edit the footage, incorporating music, transitions, and graphics to create a polished and engaging final product.
- Ensure the video is optimized for different platforms and devices.


Requirements:

- Proven experience in video editing and production, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.

- Understanding of developer audiences and the ability to explain technical concepts in a clear and concise manner is a plus.

Deliverables:

One 90 second demo video in showcasing the key features and benefits of our developer tool.


Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Demo Video, Video Enhancement, Visual Effects
Skills: Demo Video, Video Enhancement, Visual Effects

I want to launch a new YouTube and TikTok channel and need your help.

I have ~30 videos of content.

I need your help to trim the video, add some graphics and branding, then upload to social media.

You'll manage all aspects of content editing, upload, branding, and management. You've done this before, know all the tools to use, and can jump right in.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are hiring! Short Form Video Editor

What We’re Looking For...

10 Short Form Videos Per Month

1+ years of short-form video editing/motion graphics experience preferably developing highly engaging content for Instagram Reels (Experience with CapCut, After Effects, Premiere Pro etc is a must)

Proven track record of developing high-engaging videos (Just like https://www.instagram.com/daniel_iles/)

Someone who knows how to stop the scroll and capture attention

Attention to detail and someone who has their finger on the pulse of which content is likely to convert.

Ability to work independently and in a team environment.

To succeed in this role, you must be:

Self-starter i.e. you are comfortable working 100% remotely, managing your own time and multiple conversations at once

Attention to detail - You MUST have the highest attention to detail possible.

If this role sounds perfect for you, we would love to hear why you believe you would be best suited for this role - please include the word BLUE somewhere in your proposal.

Shortlisted applicants will be contacted for a PAID TRIAL task. You will be asked to provide examples of campaigns you have worked on previously with results.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:19 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor Position at Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Hi editors, hope you are doing great!

My name is Alvie and I run a content creation agency for online fitness coaches.

We specialize in creating and editing engaging reels/shorts for coaches, including talking head videos with captions and effects, as well as short text on the screen reels.

We're looking for an editor to come in and work on all of our clients' content: talking head videos, text on the screen videos, motivational videos etc.

This is a long term project and we are excited to partner with a dedicated editor on our team.

Thanks a lot, looking forward to reading your proposals!
Alvie

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: UGC content creators needed for visual inspiration - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I'm looking for a UGC creator to make an authentic video of our vision board membership at The Vision Cloud. It's quarterly magazine with lots of other things included:

https://thevisioncloud.com/

Worth reviewing our website to get a full understanding of this.

We want it to really come across as natural and not pushy, as if it is a real customer.

We will use the video along with other UGC creates to fill our reviews page and also use it on our social media.

We would like the video to focus on the annual subscription.

The main goal is to be authentic and engaging like a real customer :) Check it out and let me know your thoughts :)

Hourly Range: $30.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 07:13 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Illustrator
Country: United Kingdom
